item.title: Get Photo from Raspberry Pi
item.author: aaron-zzz@outlook.com (Aaron)
item.description: Get Image from Raspberry pi 1. Initialize the RaspberryPi with its camera Assuming that you have already configured your Raspberry Pi 3B+ and its camera module. We are going to use its internal camera package to simply grab the image and download to our PC. 2. Login on your Raspberry Pi with SSH and take shots For example, use putty.exe on Windows environment and login on to your Pi under the same network.
